channel.title: Dub-PK - "STEP into the world of Dub-PK!"
channel.description: I dont ned team any more I have started development now go to my Devpage :) - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,494472.0.html

item.title: Dub-PK - "STEP into the world of Dub-PK!"
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

[quote=“kill you704, post:16, topic:395948”]Name: Max Collins.
Msn: Maxacollins@gmail.com
Skype: Maxacollins@gmail.com
Position you are applying for: Server Coder.
1-10 how good are you at coding: 10.
How dedicated are you: I code around 7-8 hours a day during the week. During the weekend around 10-12 hours.
Why should i hire you: I am extremely dedicated. Once i start to code I don’t stop. I also have money. I currently own two VPS’s. If we ever need a backup VPS I got one. If we ever need a VPS to keep backup files on to take up less memory I got one. I hope you take me into concideration I love your source and I’d love to help out.[/quote]

Shit 10-12 hours on the weekend?? Weekend isn’t time for this

item.title: Dub-PK - "STEP into the world of Dub-PK!"
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[size=72pt][shadow=BLACK,left]PLEASE DON’T IGNORE THIS![/shadow][/size]

Name: Jon
Msn: xldarkwinglx@hotmail.com
Skype: xldarkwinglx
Position you are applying for:
1-10 how good are you at coding: Depends what I’m doing
how dedicated are you: You already know
Why should i hire you: If Shawn hasn’t told you what I said, then you might as well ignore me… But if he did, don’t ignore. I can do some minor client sided coding (nothing big), I can add some stuff to most of the skilling (no point in rewriting it) and change shit with it too, I can do server sided, I can do GFX (pictures), I can do great HTML (talk to Shawn for a voucher, and I know you’ll need me for that unless you leach a site), I have multiple ideas on how to code the grand exchange (only 1 thing I’m not positive about, which is the searching), and I can get new items off of RuneScape (if I can get the fucking compiler to work). So yea, I can do a lot. In the time we didn’t talk, I learned jizz loads of java. Also, read my email I sent to z_rowt21@live.com. I can also do all the basics, animate NPCs, make smaller versions of NPCs (for pets and shit), I can help out with castle wars, I can help out with Fist of Guthix, I can help out adding Soul Wars, I can make quests, I can make items do shit, I can make PvP areas and I can do more and you know I can.

Listen… The only reason we’re here were we are today is cause of a lot of miscommunication. I know I didn’t do much, but one thing you did tell me was not to do stuff without your permission. It got really hard to talk to you and when you did ask me to do something, you didn’t even know how to do it. You can’t expect a 14 year old to wipe coding magic out of his ass when a 17 year old can’t do it himself (I’m not God ). Anyway, I’m willing to forgive you for the treatment you gave to me (by just deleting me without saying anything and for flaming my topic) if your willing to forgive me (by retaliating the way I did when you did delete me). If you do decide to forgive me, please try to keep communicated with me and I’ll be in communication with you.

I don’t know whats going on with RuneWings cause artem is forever switching sources and working on TensionX so I’m kinda like “WTF is going on…”. So yea, I guess Wilderness Guardians is down the drain (salehs never on anymore…). And I guess the reason I’m trying to code with you again is because I know you won’t bail on me and I hope you won’t just close down like you did with Nitro-Scape and I’m guessing your RS-PS remake. But if we keep communicating this time, I think we could go far.

So think about it. I’m always here when you need me, whether I’m part of the team or not, and I hope we can be good friends again.

Sorry for all the shit I did,
Jon (XLdarkwingLX)

Also, about that question you asked about the day we had the miss happening, try clearing the cache, history and cookies I know its late but I was tired and wasn’t thinking that day. That might of done it. Not sure. But IE is really shitty, get chrome, so much better

Read full topic
